Title: Enacts the  election workers, voters and polling places protection act
Summary: Enacts the "election workers, voters and polling places protection act" to protect voters, poll watchers, election officials, and any damage to physical property being used as a polling place or by the board of elections; makes violations a class D felony which includes imprisonment of up to seven years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to enacting the "election workers, voters and polling places protection act"
